NMproject 0.5.9.9000

Create core NM object

Source: R/NMprojectExtra.R
nm.Rd

Experimental new nm object interface. Not compatible with previous system. The basic object this package centres around. Most package functions act on this object.

nm(
  run_id = NA_character_,
  run_in = nm_default_dir("models"),
  parent_run_id = NA_character_,
  parent_run_in = NA_character_,
  parent_ctl_name = NA_character_,
  parent_results_dir = NA_character_,
  ctl_name = "run{run_id}.mod",
  type = "execute",
  run_dir = "{run_id}",
  results_dir = nm_default_dir("results"),
  lst_path = "{run_dir}/NM_run1/psn.lst"
)

Arguments

run_id

character vector. Run identifier
run_in

character vector. ctl file and run location
parent_run_id

character vector (optional). Run identifier of previous run
parent_run_in

character vector (optional). Run location of previous run
parent_ctl_name

character vector (optional). Ctl name of previous run
parent_results_dir

character vector (optional). results_dir of previous run
ctl_name

character. Name of control file
type

character (default = "execute"). Type of run to run
run_dir

character (default = "run_id"). Subdirectory where PsN wll run NONMEM
results_dir

character (default = "Results"). Directory to store results of this run
lst_path

character (default = "run_dir/NM_run1/psn.lst") expected location of lst file

Value

An object of class nm_list. Object is concatenatable. Length of object corresponds to length of run_id

Examples

if (FALSE) {

m0 <- nm(run_id = "m0")
m0  ## a human readable representation
  
## nm objects can be put into tibbles to group runs together
d <- tibble(run_id = c("m1","m2"))
d$m <- nm(d$run_id)
d  

}
